usefulItems: cling film, wooden skewers, aluminium foil, refrigerator, grill
title: Grilled Pork Skewers with Turmeric

ingredients.content: 5 g fresh root ginger, peeled, cut in round slices (2 mm)
½ stick lemon grass, fresh, tough outer layer removed, cut in pieces (2 cm)
680 g pork fillet, cut in large pieces (3 cm)

preparations.content: Place coriander seeds and cumin seeds in mixing bowl then, without measuring cup, toast <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 3<b>.
Add ginger, oil, garlic and lemon grass then grind <b>20 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then grind again <b>20 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add turmeric, curry powder, salt, sugar, and coconut milk then mix <b>5 sec/speed 3<b>. Transfer to a bowl.
Place bowl with marinade on mixing bowl lid then weigh in pork. Stir well then cover with cling film and marinate in fridge for at least 6 hours or overnight.
Soak skewers in warm water for 30 minutes. Towards the end of soaking time, preheat grill to 230°C.
Thread marinated pork onto skewers (approx. 3 pieces per skewer).
Place skewers on grill tray lined with foil then grill for 15-20 minutes turning occasionally. Serve hot.
